item.title: 7 best practices for building containers
item.author: Sergii Lischuk
item.description: Development was always a way of evolution. The evolution of modern programming development brings a lot of techniques and requirements - its hard to imagine today’s programming without high-level frameworks, containers, cloud computing or special data storages (even if they are not necessary). Working with some of them, I would like to share small notes about the containerization, especially with Docker containers.
